EmailTemplate.subject: Gymnastics program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
A gymnastics program for Years 1 â€“ 4 will be introduced in term 2!
Directed by Miss. Marwood, the program will run over 8 weeks and the cost is RM 300 per child.
Full details of the program including dates/times and how to register can be found by following the link below:
BSKL Gymnastics
Should you have any questions please contact Miss Marwood on:
annalicia.marwood@britishschool.edu.my
Regards, Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
